members.name: BroadcastChannel()
members.description: Creates an object linking to the named channel.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Is a DOMString representing the name of the channel; there is one single channel with this name for all browser contexts with the same origin.

members.name: BroadcastChannel.name
members.description: Returns a DOMString, the name of the channel.

members.name: BroadcastChannel.onmessage
members.description: Is an EventHandler property that specifies the function to execute when a message event is fired on this object.

members.name: BroadcastChannel.postMessage()
members.description: Sends the message, of any type of object, to each BroadcastChannel object listening to the same channel.

members.name: BroadcastChannel.close()
members.description: Closes the channel object, indicating it won't get any new messages, and allowing it to be, eventually, garbage collected.
